subject: Football
College Athletics
Education and Schools
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers running back Ray Rice is one player who has benefited from Play It Smart, a nonprofit program to help football players in inner-city schools with their studies.
